Articles.Content:
Hi folks,

I have recently installed a new GPU (ATI 5770) and am having some issues.

I have spent over an hour adjusting every setting I can but I cannot seem to get my shadows to display. 

As I don't use mods or anything shadows are vital to the way I play when it comes to landing so as you can imagine I am somewhat vexed!!

Anyone else out the have the same issue or know a fix please?

Thanks in advance,

Ben.

Hi Benno, please see the support stickies and provide your game logs including the settings.cfg and dxdiag ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Shadows should be on by default.

Hiya,

Consider me rather un-technical, I did read the stickies but don't understand what they mean. Sorry to be a pain!!

Ben.
We need your games KSP.log and settings.cfg, both are in the game folder, also your [dxdiag](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DxDiag) log, you can post these to [dropbox](dropbox.com).
